title: Alarm Clock, Snoop Dogg, Kim Kardashian, Taco Tuesday and more.
itunes:title: Alarm Clock, Snoop Dogg, Kim Kardashian, Taco Tuesday and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride.  Today's show is dedicated to those with Attention Deficit Disorder.  A listener is curious to know the crew's morning routine after the alarm goes off.  Snoop Dogg in Kansas may have been a little too much according to some.  Kim K strikes again with another release.  Trump has support from youth black leadership.  Demario Davis is fined by NFL for religious beliefs.  Is it possible to get sued for stealing another man's wife?  Taco Tuesday is here and we see if there are personality differences between hard and soft taco eaters.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog reflects on his time in Jamaica and here is the message, just look again.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
